Requirement.formula: #program; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RigellianChristmasSpaceship')); if(!isNULL(building)) { return Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'Destroyed') == 1; } return false;

#program; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RigellianChristmasSpaceship')); if(!isNULL(building)) { return Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'Destroyed') == 0; } return false;
